name: Crafted_Luck_of_the_Gambler_D
display_name: Crafted Luck of the Gambler D
display_fullname: Boosts.Crafted Luck of the Gambler D
display_help: Enhances the defense of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Defense.Scale}%, reduces endurance costs by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Defense, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
